[[tab 도전 과제]]
= 참고: [[[hal-aki-achievement-badges|]]] by [[user hal_aki]] and [[user tsucchii0301]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_参加表明.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**참가 표명**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**사이트 가입 승인되기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_はじめましての挨拶.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**처음 뵙겠습니다**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**포럼에 포스트 쓰기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_秘密の実験室.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**비밀 실험실**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**샌드박스에 내 페이지 개설하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_三人寄れば.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**백지장도 맞들면**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**포럼에서 작품 비평 받기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_小さな一歩.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**작은 한 걸음**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**글을 하나 쓰기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_採用通知.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**채용 통지**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**인사 파일 작성하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_みならい・ほんやく.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**수습 - 번역**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**해외 작품을 5개 이상 번역하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_ミスター・ほんやく.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**미스터 - 번역**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**해외 작품을 10개 이상 번역하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_とってもエキサイト.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**대단히 익사이팅**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**해외 작품을 20개 이상 번역하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_マスター・ほんやく.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**마스터 - 번역**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**해외 작품을 100개 이상 번역하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="left-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_週刊誌.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**주간지**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**한 달에 4개 이상의 작품을 쓰기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="right-grid"]]
[[f<image http://scp-jp.wdfiles.com/local--files/hal-aki-achievement-badges/実績_バイリンガル.png width="50"]]
[[size 120%]][[span style="color:#970118"]]**바이링구얼**[[/span]][[/size]]
[[size 85%]]**본사 외 지부 사이트의 작품을 한국어로 번역하기**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]

/* Grid layout */

#page-content .left-grid {
    float: left;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}
#page-content .right-grid {
    float: right;
    width: 49%;
    height: 110px;
}

/* Mobile Media Query */
@media (max-width: 479px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Note Media Query */
@media (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 580px) { 
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

/* Tablet Media Query */
@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 979px) {
#page-content .left-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
#page-content .right-grid  {
    width: 100%;
    float: left;
}
}

[[/module]]
